The sun ended the weekend with a bang as a sunspot rotating out of our view erupted with a powerful solar flare on Sunday afternoon.
At 2:27 p.m. EST (1927 GMT) on Sunday, (Feb. 24), a X2.0 solar fl… [+3034 chars]
